title: The Fatal discovery, or, Love in ruines a tragedy, as it is acted at the Theatre Royal by His Majesty's servants : with a preface in answer to a scandalous copy of verses written by Mr. Dryden and prefixt to a play call'd Heroick love.
author: Powell, George, 1658?-1714.
publisher: Printed by J. Orme for R. Wellington ... and sold by Percivil Gilborne ... and Bernard Lantott ...,
